html:
hand/right hand. The right hand is the hand of authority. It is also the "covenant hand," or the hand we use to covenant with the Lord.

laid the foundation of the earth/spanned the heavens. God is the Creator, who has all power both in our sphere (earth) and in all other spheres (heavens; see Ps. 102:25; D&C 45:1; Moses 6:44).

I call/they stand up. Both earth and heaven obey God's command.
